summary: Provides functionality to define a scenario for generating focused search queries based on a keyphrase and implements a synthesizer that selects relevant text chunks, extracts a concise keyphrase, and uses a prompt-driven generator to produce multiple specific queries for testing retrieval or generation pipelines.
business_intent: Enable automated creation of realistic, targeted queries to evaluate and benchmark retrieval and generation components in Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.
